Borefts Beer Festival 2018\nDe Molen Brewery\nDoortocht 4, Bodegraven Sep 21 – 22\n12:00 – 21:45 Note: pre-sale only! Entry & tokens Buy extra\ntokens 3500 ticket per day are available, only available online in the pre-sale. € 35,- for glass, festival booklet and 10 tokens. Additional tokens can be bought with cash or card. Extra tokens € 2,- = 1 beer. NOT 18 YEARS NO ALCOHOL Public transport Trains run every half hour, in each direction, at :15 and :45. Last trains leave at 00:45. Departures Please don\'t drink and drive. Taxis are available via the regional taxi companies. Find taxis Beer shop Find mill The beer shop in the old mill is of course open; for De Molen specialties, festival beers and hundreds of other beers. Merchandise Most brewers will again bring merchansise this year. Moreover, a special Borefts festival t-shirt will be available. You can pay in cash or with card. %1$s, %2$s %1$.1f%% color abv bitter sweet acidic Abv: %1$.1f%% oak aged Untappd Google (indication based on style) on keg on cask on bottle Stars No beers starred yet.\n\nYou can add your favourite beers to this list using the star button in the top of every beer details screen.
